name: Charred Black Plate
data: It increases the users strength a tiny bit.
It increases the users dexterity a bit.
It increases the users constitution adequately.
It decreases the users intelligence pitifully.
It has awesome armour class for its type (excellent in general).
It increases the users spellpoint regeneration poorly.
It increases the users hitpoint regeneration poorly.
This item loses its magical powers with average speed.
